  • Method Details

    • name

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder name(String name)

    • friction

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder friction(float value)
      Sets the friction value of the block. Default is 0.6f.

    • destructibleByExplosion

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder destructibleByExplosion(boolean value)
      Sets the explosion resistance of the block. Default is 0. Accepted values are: false or any int value 0 or greater

      False means block can not be exploded, or any int value will make it destructible but as bigger the value more resistance.

    • destructibleByExplosion

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder destructibleByExplosion(int resistance)
      Sets the explosion resistance of the block. Default is 0. Accepted values are: false or any int value 0 or greater

      False means block can not be exploded, or any int value will make it destructible but as bigger the value more resistance.

    • destructibleByMining

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder destructibleByMining(boolean value)
      Sets the mining time in seconds. Default is 0.0f. You can pass false to make it unbreakable.

    • destructibleByMining

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder destructibleByMining(float seconds)
      Sets the mining time in seconds. Default is 0.0f. Use false to make the block unbreakable by mining.

    • breakTime

      @Deprecated public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder breakTime(float seconds)
      Deprecated.
      Use destructibleByMining(float) or destructibleByMining(boolean) instead.

    • lightDampening

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder lightDampening(int lightLevel)
      Sets the light dampening level. Default is 15.

    • lightEmission

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder lightEmission(int emission)
      Sets the light emission level. Default is 0.

    • mapColor

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder mapColor(String hexColor)
      Sets the map color used in maps. Default is #ffffff.

    • texture

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder texture(String texture)
      Set the texture of the block.

    • materials

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder materials(Materials materials)

      Control the grouping of custom blocks in the creation inventory.

      Control the grouping of custom blocks in the creation inventory.
      See Also:

    • isHiddenInCommands

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder isHiddenInCommands(boolean hidden)
      Sets whether the item/block should be hidden from commands like /give and /replaceitem.
      Parameters:
      hidden - true to hide, false to show (default: false)
      Returns:
      this builder

    • craftingTable

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder craftingTable(CraftingTable craftingTable)
      See Also:
      • wiki.bedrock.dev

    • transformation

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder transformation(@NotNull @NotNull Transformation transformation)
      supports rotation, scaling, and translation. The component can be added to the whole block and/or to individual block permutations. Transformed geometries still have the same restrictions that non-transformed geometries have such as a maximum size of 30/16 units.

    • rotation

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder rotation(@NotNull @NotNull Vector3f rotation)
      Set the rotation of the block around the center of the block in degrees, the rotation order is xyz. The angle must be a multiple of 90.

    • geometry

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder geometry(String geometry)
      Sets the geometry identifier of the block using a string. If not set the default is the full_block.

      This does not set bone visibility; bones will be hidden by default. Use geometry(Geometry) for advanced control.

    • geometry

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder geometry(@NotNull @NotNull Geometry geometry)
      Sets a full geometry definition with optional bone visibility. If not set the default is the full_block.

      Use this to control visible bones or other geometry properties.

    • permutation

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder permutation(Permutation permutation)
      Control custom block permutation features such as conditional rendering, partial rendering, etc.

    • permutations

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder permutations(Permutation... permutations)
      Control custom block permutation features such as conditional rendering, partial rendering, etc.

    • collisionBox

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder collisionBox(@NotNull @NotNull Vector3f origin, @NotNull @NotNull Vector3f size)
      Set the block collision box.
      Parameters:
      origin - The origin of the collision box
      size - The size of the collision box

    • selectionBox

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder selectionBox(@NotNull @NotNull Vector3f origin, @NotNull @NotNull Vector3f size)
      Sets the block selection box.
      Parameters:
      origin - The origin of the collision box
      size - The size of the collision box

    • blockTags

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder blockTags(String... tag)

    • isPlayerInteractable

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder isPlayerInteractable(boolean value)

    • hasPlayerPlacingSensor

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder hasPlayerPlacingSensor(boolean value)

    • blockTick

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder blockTick(int minTicks, int maxTicks, boolean looping)
      Defines how this custom block should tick over time.
      Parameters:
      minTicks - The minimum number of ticks before the block updates.
      maxTicks - The maximum number of ticks before the block updates. Must be ≥ minTicks.
      looping - If true, the block will continue ticking; if false, it will tick only once.
      Returns:
      This builder instance for chaining. Example: .blockTick(60, 60, true) will schedule the block to tick every 3 seconds.

    • isStepSensor

      public CustomBlockDefinition.Builder isStepSensor(boolean value)
      Enables step sensor logic (entity step-on/off).

      When enabled, override

      invalid reference 
      #onEntityStepOn(Entity)
      and
      invalid reference 
      #onEntityStepOff(Entity)
      for custom handling.

    • customBuild

      public CustomBlockDefinition customBuild(@NotNull @NotNull Consumer<CompoundTag> nbt)
      Custom processing of the block to be sent to the client ComponentNBT, which contains all definitions for custom block. You can modify them as much as you want, under the right conditions.

    • build

      public CustomBlockDefinition build()
